name: Project BoomerShooter
description:
Retro FPS-game with that retrofeel to it. Inspired by classics like duke nukem 3d and quake 1. You collect keys, healthpacks, ammoboxes, open doors to advance in maps. There are 4 maps, 1 final boss, 4 diffrent enimes, 3 weapons.

All assets made by me, but sound is taken elsewhere. Textures are made in photoshop or grabbed off google.

This is my first real FPS-game I made in modern times.

Enjoy it, it´s free.
